Text: NewPower Connections Remote Energy Mgmt Solution Brochure ApplicationCustomer Thanks for your inquiry regarding NewPowers home technology pilot in Houston Texas Please note you do not need to be a NewPower electricity customer to participate in this pilot The technology pilot is a separate program If you have already signed up for this pilot through some other means such as in the lobby of the Enron building or via fax please disregard this message Sears will contact you to schedule you installation within a couple of weeks Below you will find the electronic version of the NewPower Connections Remote Energy Management Solution brochure and application NewPower trifoldpdf To participate in the pilot simply Launch the PDF File NewPower trifoldpdf Note You will need Adobe Acrobat Reader Scroll down to the second page of the brochure where the application is located Print out the brochureapplication Fill it out and fax it back to us at to the attention of NewPower Connections or Mail the completed application to us at The New Power Company One Manhattanville Road rd Floor Purchase NY attn NewPower Connections Sears will call you in two to four weeks to schedule the installation Remember the NewPower Connections Remote Energy Management Solution pilot program is completely FREE to the first participants Free hardware free installation free service calls and no monthly service fees or hidden charges At the conclusion of the pilot those first pilot participants will be Grandfathered so Remote Energy Management will remain free to them should the service be continued as a real mass market product Remember to participate in the pilot you must meet the following qualifications You must reside in the Greater Houston Area The outer limits or our service area generally will include Kingwood The Woodlands Tomball Katy Sugarland Pearland League City and Baytown Reliant Energy HLP should be your current service provider You must own and live full time in a single family home No Apartments Please You must have internet access either at work or at home You must NOT have any other Powerline Carrier Devices currently installed in the home Such as X Devices Your home must have central heating and air conditioning Please let us know on the application if you have a Dialup or Broadband Internet connection at home If you do have broadband please advise if it is DSL or Cable and who the service provider is ie PDQnet SBC Earthlink etc Just write it anywhere If you like our NewPower Connections Remote Energy Management Solution feel free to forward this brochure and application to your friends and family Thank you The New Power Company

Fixing Your ThermostatTradingpst Willy I having an electrician come out to install a new thermostat at your house He can do it sometime today or tomorrow I gave the electrician your work and home phone numbers so he will be calling you to see when he can go out We think the thermostat you got is a lemon We are just going to have a new one installed and see if it solves your problems Kevin

Test Homes for Technology PilotTradingpst Kriendler and Willy Would you guys be willing to have your installations done for the Remote Energy Management Pilot done next week You would be out of the first test homes I would be coming by with the installers and possibly some media people You can get the royal treatment If so I need to get some information What is your address What is your home phone number What is your office phone Do you have dialup internet connection or broadband If you have broadband is it cable or DSL If you have broadband who is your provider Regards Kevin
